biotools.summary: ReadTools is an open‐source toolkit designed to standardize and preprocess sequencing read data from different platforms. It manages FASTQ‐ and SAM‐formatted inputs while dealing with platform‐specific peculiarities and provides a standard SAM compliant output.

bioschemas.name: ReadTools
